It would be useful to allow users to retarget hunks from a patch to another file in the workspace.

The workflow should go:

1) User right clicks on a diff, selects retarget diff. The retarget dialog pops up, and the user selects which file he wants to apply the diff to.

2) Clicking on the retargeted diff will now bring up the contents of the selected file and the user can merge the diff in by hand.

3) When finish is clicked for the rest of the patch, the retargeted file is saved as well.
